name: Bitter Sweet Music SC
description:
Bitter Sweet Music broadcasts music that are packed with the noted taste of music to give listeners a kind of listening experience only few can match.
Bitter Sweet Music its a bit bit botter and a bit sweet...

name: ItaloRadio.fm
description: The Best Italo Disco and New Generation Italo Disco 24 hours a day Non-Stop !!

name: Radiosesel
description: Radiosesel is an online community radio station. Their aim is to bring the sounds of paradise to the global online Seychellois community. Their playlist is 100% Kreol. The only exception to this rule are songs that have been recorded in other languages by Seychellois artists. Their music criteria is simple, they don't play songs that contain profanity, abuse, derogatory or political propaganda

name: SBC PARADISE FM
description: Paradise FM broadcasts 24 hours a day. It is a predominantly music service which also offers sports, advertisements and talk shows

name: HOMERADIOGROOVE
description: HOMERADIOGROOVE is a broadcast radio station in Seychelles, providing Electronic, Dance, Techno, Trance and house music.

name: PureFM
description:
PureFM is the first commercial radio station to be granted a licence to operate in the Seychelles. PureFM is a culmination of hard work by a team of dedicated people implementing the idea of a local hotelier who practices corporate citizenship.
	Show more

name: Radio 078
description: Radio 078 is het ultieme 80’s muziek radiostation op internet! Opgericht in 2013 door een aantal dj’s van voormalige radiopiraten. Radio 078 draait 7 dagen per week, 24 uur per dag, de lekkerste hits uit de 80’s. In het weekend ook gepresenteerde shows door de dj’s uit de jaren 80!
